Title: Integrated Dual-DFB Laser for 408 GHz Carrier Generation Enabling 131 Gbit/s Wireless Transmission over 10.7 Meters
Source: Opt. Fiber Commun. Conf. Exhib., OFC - Proc.
Abstract: © 2019 OSA.A monolithically integrated dual-DFB laser generates a 408 GHz carrier used for demonstrating a record-high single-channel bit rate of 131 Gbit/s transmitted over 10.7 m. 16-QAM-OFDM modulation and specific nonlinear equalization techniques are employed.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
